entries.text: Cast a bright light upon surroundings
Reduce damage and sound from fall
Emit crystal breath of Seath the Scaleless
Erect giant fire pillars in vicinity
Create a surge of flame from palm of hand
Create powerful, giant flame in hand
Emit acid which corrodes weapons and armor
Iron flesh boosts defence and resilience
Charm Undead and gain temporary allies
Short strength/endurance boost, but lose HP
Erect chaos fire pillars in vicinity
Sweep foes with chaos fire whip
Restores high HP for self and vicinity
Gradual HP restoration for self and vicinity
Gravelord swords jut out in vicinity
Giant Gravelord swords jut out in vicinity
While active, no losses incurred upon death
Return to last bonfire used for resting
Display more guidance from other worlds
Cover body in defensive magic coating
Cover body in powerful def. magic coating
Temporary auto counter vs. heavy damage
Slows all walking within effect area
Prevents casting of magic within effect area
Boost right weapon with rays of Sun
Boost right weapon with rays of Darkmoon
Fire more powerful heavy soul arrow
Greatly reinforce right weapon with magic
Reinforce right weapon with crystal magic
Greatly reinforce left shield with magic
Cast light to illuminate surroundings and increases lightning damage by 10%
Mask noises of caster and prevent fall damage
Distract foes with a distant sound
Emit crystal breath of Seath the Scaleless
Cast cascade of small crystal soulmasses from sky
Attack with a greatsword formed from souls
Attack with a sword formed from souls
Strike with blade formed of humanity's darkness
Distort light in order to deflect magic and damages enemies who touch it
Release a cloud of mist that eats away at HP
Fires soul wave that pierces enemies
Strikes with blade formed of humanity's darkness
Cast cascade of homing soul sediment from sky
Strike foes with a sudden blast of wind
Send a penetrating blade of air flying at your enemies
Call down a flurry of winds around yourself, damaging nearby enemies
Call down ripping wind upon your foes
Launch a shockwave of air at foes
Send torrents of wind rolling over foes in front of you
Increase cast speed, remove stam usage, increase stam recovery and reduce fall damage
Cleave enemies with a downward blade of air
Knock enemies back with a sudden blast of wind
Blast foes with a tunnel of twisting wind
Inflicting curse on nearby enemies while also increasing defences
Conjure a close-range spike of air from your hand
Curse an enemy, causing damage for 10 seconds
Curse an enemy, causing damage and lowering resistance to dark for 20 seconds
Disrupt your own soul power to augment your magic
Fires a volley of souls at your enemies from close range
Corrupts the mind of an enemy making it a foe to anyone
Fires a volley of soul sediments at your enemies from close range
Drains the HP of nearby enemies and reduces their dark resistance
Conjure eight swords of air that seek and pierce your foes
Prevents an enemy from casting spells for 5 seconds
Causes damage over time and prevents spell casting for 15 seconds
Unleash your inner power of the lion knights
Conjure a twisting whirlwind of air that persistently follows an enemy
Sacrifice spell power and attack power for many abyssal gifts
Conjure a focused blade of air on your catalyst and slash at foes
Instantly removes 15% of the foe's total HP. Only works while the creature has 15% HP or less
Fortify your soul with your magical energies
Fire a focused projectile of light at an enemy
Fire a small orb of light at enemies, knocking them back and inflicted poise and stamina damage
Fire a continuous beam of light at enemies dealing damage
Fire a powerful projectile of light at an enemy
Releases a homing lightmass, dealing damage to enemies
Release a row of light spears in front of you, dealing damage to enemies
Emit a circle of light in all directions around you that weakens enemies by 60% for 10 seconds
Channel the light around you to restore your health
Release a projectile that causes some enemies to lose the will to fight
Create a layer of light around you that prevents interruption and raises defenses
Calls upon a storm of light descending upon enemies
Teleport a short distance in front of you. Sprinting increases the distance
Conjure a sword of light and slash enemies in front of you
Your weapon becomes untethered in time, causing anything struck by it to rapidly age
Erect multiple fire pillars in vicinity
Emit a constant stream of fire
Release undulating black flame that runs along the ground
Create powerful, giant flame in hand
Emit acid which corrodes weapons and armor
Intense sweating increases fire damage absorption
Charm the enemy, making them a temporary ally
Temporarily boost attack, but gradually lose HP
Erect multiple chaos fire pillars in vicinity
Create giant, black flame in hand
Engulf foes at range and burn them to ashes
Hurl chaos flame that scorches vicinity
Create a gentle flame that restores HP on touch
Profuse sweating temporarily boosts all resistances
Spew a boulder from one's mouth
Flame burrows inside foes and ignites
Release flaming chaos orbs from sky
Unleashes a large mass of Dark
Call down boulders from the sky
Heave earth in multiple locations in vicinity
Cast an orb of ice that bursts upon impact
Emit a trail of ice along the ground in front of you
Throw a seething ice shard that opens a rift of freezing flame
Surround yourself with an aura of frost
Breathe an explosive toxin forward on the ground in front of you
Hurls black flame that scorches vicinity
Summon icy shards that seek your foes
Tear open a freezing vacuum in reality around you
Conjure a lump of rock in your hand and fling it at enemies
Summon wisps of flame around you that seek enemies
Call a tower of flame from the ground below the nearest enemy
Hurl a frozen spear of ice at enemies
Creates a cloud of near-freezing mist
Summon multiple spots of frost in vicinity
Launch a heavy missile of earth at foes that bursts on impact
Shoot a tiny ball of flame from your hand
Emit a wave of icy fire along the ground in front of you
Emit a burst of ice along the ground in front of you
Adds 80 dark damage to your right-hand weapon for 60 seconds
Deals frost damage to those that enter the patch of flowers
Throw a mass of mud at your enemies
Conjure a lump of rock in your hand and fling it at enemies
Curse an enemy with a persistent, biting cold
Conjure a cold, rudimentary flame from the abyss
Launch a high flying flame orb that bombards enemies from above
Hurl an orb of poisonous earth at enemies causing poison build up
Conjure a swarm of venomous insects, causing massive toxic build up
Rain down numerous flaming meteors upon foes
Invoke the power of the dragon crossbreed
Call the icy flames of the abyss upon your foe, causing a whirlwind of black flame
Attune your body to the ancient world, leaving behind the burdens of the flame
Tap into the powers of the earth to restore your body, healing you quickly over 5 seconds
Summon a vicious hound as your minion that will attack your enemies
Summon a small poisonous rat as your minion that will attack your enemies
Summon a large poison rat as your minion that will attack your enemies

Summon a sewer centipede as your minion that will attack your enemies
Summon a rock lizard as your minion that will attack your enemies
Summon a ravenous crystal lizard as your minion that will attack your enemies
Summon a ghru leaper as your minion that will attack your enemies
Summon an elder ghru as your minion that will attack your enemies
Fire a small magic projectile at enemies that deals damage and drains HP for a short duration
Fire a spear of life essence and deals magic damage and drains HP over a short duration
Heals the caster slowly for a prolonged period of time
Cover your body with sharp limbs and thorns
Increases damage and defense for you and any nearby summon for a short time
A strong healing spell that affects you and any nearby summon
Throw a water-filled projectile at your enemies
Unleash a powerful stream of water
Summon heavy rainfall transferring life essence of your enemies to you, healing you over time
Adds 80 magic damage to your right-hand weapon for 60 seconds
Summon a wretch as your minion that will attack your enemies
Summon an outrider knight as your minion that will attack your enemies
Release several orbs of essence that seek enemies and drain HP upon impact
Send life essence into the ground around you, causing crystals to violently erupt
Conjure a surging pool of water at your feet, damaging all nearby enemies
Restore HP for self and vicinity
Restore moderate HP for self and vicinity
Restore high HP for self and vicinity
Restore high HP for self and broad area
Gradually restore high HP for self and broad area
Cure ailments for self and vicinity
Channel divine energy into a malleable bow of solid lightning
Fire a sunlight arrow at enemies that calls down a lightning storm on impact
Grant one chance to endure when HP reaches 0
Return caster to last bonfire rested at, or to shrine
Reveal more help, and signs without using ember
Call forth furious bolts of lightning
Summon insect swarm to feast on foes
Summon great insect swarm to feast on foes
Increase magic damage absorption with coating
Greatly increase magic damage absorption with coating
Boost ATK/DMG absorption for self and vicinity
Prevent spells in vicinity, including one's own
Reinforce right weapon with Darkmoon light
Reinforce right weapon with blood and dark
Bless corpses, transforming them into traps
Strike with a stake of lightning
Bring down multiple pillars of light in vicinity
Steal HP of foes using an illusory scythe
Summon swarm of insects that nestles within foes
Launch white discuses outwards from the conjurer
Summon insect swarm to feast on foes
Summon massive insect swarm to feast on foes
Toss a cluster of maggots on your foe
Throw an orb of blood at foes
Conjure a mass of insect clouds that seek enemies and cause damage and bleeding
Summon the spirits of humanity to seek vengeance on your foes
Release a piercing missile of dark blood
Unleash clouds of maggots that descend on foes
Brings down multiple pillars of blue lightning in vicinity
Imbue the caster with the power of blood
Fire a blessed projectile that erupts into a shockwave of light
Create a circle of light that damages enemies within it
Create an invisible barrier around you, knocking back your foes
Block Estus recovery and null effects of special area effects for a short time
Channel lightning around you, striking foes on all sides
Call down lightning from the heavens to strike foes
Grants one chance to endure when HP reaches 0
Slam enemies with a holy great-hammer
Reach out and strike enemies with lightning from your hand
Send a slow concentrated wave of lightning forward that shocks foes near it
Increases lightning damage by 10% and reduces miracle FP cost by 50% for 20 seconds
Drain blood from your foes to restore your health
Reduces the FP cost of miracles by 25% while at full health
Increases all status effects/resistances/absorption while at 50% or higher HP
Increases SP recovery and reduces the SP cost while at full health
Conjure a blood blade dealing dark damage. You gain 5% HP back on every successful hit
Grasp an enemy and drain their life away while healing the caster
Enhance the shield worn on your left hand with a sliver of divine fury
Unleash the full power of sunlight
Become immune to damage, stagger and status effects but also reduces your damage completely
Instantly travel forward knocking back and dealing damage to any enemy near your landing
Fire a beam of divine power at a single enemy, dealing massive damage
Unleash a volley of sunlight spears upon your foes
Creates a series of devastating shockwaves
Unleash a powerful blast of darkmoon magic that pierces foes
Send flames out in front of you that return with a massive explosion
Rip open the ground in front of you, dealing damage to enemies
Casts an enormous fireball with long range and massive destructive power
Fire a frozen ice orb at enemies that emits intense cold
Conjure a moon crystal that bursts upon impact
Fire a magic Darkmoon lance at enemies
Conjure Darkmoon orbs that descend upon foes
Detonate a sweeping explosion expanding outward from the caster
Release a volley of light projectiles upon foes
Launch a magic Darkmoon wave at enemies
Call down brilliant pillars of light upon enemies in front of you
Call down sunlight spears from above that seek foes
Launch a piercing wind lance at enemies
Call down a massive ice comet on enemies
Cast a volley of dark orbs that seek and converge upon enemies
Create an abyssal incursion into this realm that rains dregs from above
Call dark orbs from all directions, converging on the caster
Release a piercing missile of dark blood that causes excessive bleeding
Call down a bolt of lightning upon an enemy
Call blood to rain from the sky upon your foes
Sweep foes with an icy avalanche
Rupture the earth in front of you, tearing open fissures of toxic fumes
Release dark wisps that seek enemies and pull the blood from their body
Call down a whirlwind upon foes
Call a mighty storm from all directions
Emit a beam of focused fire at enemies
Release a multitude of holy missiles at foes
Instantly unleash a powerful shockwave around yourself
Unleash a cascading storm of light from above, seeking and damaging enemies
Conjure a solar zenith to boost damage and resistances
Receive the blessing of the Allfather
Unleash a dark cloud of death and disease upon the world, damaging enemies
Devour the soul of your opponents draining their hp
Release an essence crystal into the air that then falls on enemies with a massive explosion
Cover your body in radiant life crystals
Imbued with shadowy dregs, the blade bursts upon impact
Destroy your undead minion causing damage to any enemy near it and fully restoring your HP
Cast once to create an ever-dwindling mote of moonlight within oneself
Release a moon wisp into the air, falling on enemies and erupts into a massive crystal bloom on the ground
Fires a torrential volley of moon power
Call upon the power of the moon dealing massive damage
Raise a hollow soldier as your minion that will attack your enemies
Raise a skeletal warrior as your minion that will attack your enemies
Raise a corpse-grub made of maggots as your minion that will attack your enemies
Raise an undead lycanthrope as your minion that will attack your enemies
Raise a thrall of the Settlement as your minion that will attack your enemies
Raise a grave warden skeleton of Carthus as your minion that will attack your enemies
Raise an abyssal darkwraith as your minion that will attack your enemies
Raise a pus of man as your minion that will attack your enemies
Raise a deep accursed as your minion that will attack your enemies
Conjure a skull and throw it at enemies, dealing magic damage
Summon multiple gravelord’s greatswords, impaling nearby enemies from below
Terrify enemies around you, causing them to temporarily not attack
Invoke the corruption of death around your body, draining the HP of enemies nearby
Unleash a carpet of disease in front of you
Charms an undead enemy, making them a temporary ally
Conjure a sharpened projectile of bone and throw it at enemies
Embrace the power of death to transform into a lich
Conjure an orb of conjoined skeletons and hurl it at enemies
Spew the vapors of death from your talisman
Raise a bonewheel skeleton as your minion that will attack your enemies
Buffs your blade with necromantic power
Raise a hollow manservant as your minion that will attack your enemies
Hurl a concentrated miasmic ball at enemies
Assume the form of a mindless undead, disabling spells but gaining many strengths
Conjure a miasmic orb that slowly creeps forward
